channel.title: Help with you client only
channel.description:
Im reading the tutorial where only your client can connect and i got stuck on this part Go into your server folder, locate and open client.java Go to your run method( Public void run() )
Declare this:
Quote int UID = inStream.readDWord(); You have to declare UID so that the server knows what a UID is.
Still in the run method... Scroll down a bit, until you see things like the following:
What does it mean declare
int UID = inStream.readDWord(); ?

item.title: Help with you client only
item.dc:creator: @coco_zezima coco zezima
item.description:
@coco_zezima wrote:

Im reading the tutorial where only your client can connect
and i got stuck on this part
Go into your server folder, locate and open client.java
Go to your run method( Public void run() )

Declare this:

Quote
int UID = inStream.readDWord();
You have to declare UID so that the server knows what a UID is.

Still in the run methodâ€¦
Scroll down a bit, until you see things like the following:

What does it mean declare

int UID = inStream.readDWord();
?

Read full topic
